Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Thasian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay fine, micaceous, orange-brown. Rectangular stamp with sea monster symbol.
Curator's comments: Garlan, Y., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos. 1, Timbres protothasiens et thasiens anciens (Paris 1999), no. 941? Names Zopyros (Thasian fabricant) and Nikias (Thasian eponym). Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0011)
